Rooms.Description: You are now in your bedroom. You can either go up the ladder to the attic, or go down the hatch to the basement. You can also take the door and go out.
You are now in your attic.
Rooms.Name: Attic
Rooms.DetailedDescription: In the attic's shadows, forgotten memories gather dust. Cracked photo albums and vintage trinkets whisper tales of bygone days. The flickering light reveals a tapestry of nostalgia, as moth-eaten curtains sway in the gentle breeze. An old rocking chair sits still, holding echoes of laughter and quiet moments. The attic, a silent witness to the passage of time, guards its memories with a quiet, timeless charm.

Item.Name: Crystalized Nectar
Item.Description: a rare and potent treat that heals wounds

Rooms.Description: You are now in the basement.
Rooms.Name: Basement
Rooms.DetailedDescription: You look around and see a dimly lit space with cool air. It's filled with stored items, neatly arranged against the walls. There are shelves, boxes, and a workbench, hinting at various hobbies and pastimes. The air carries a faint scent of old books and wood. There is a key in the corner of the room.

Rooms.Description: You are now in your garden. There is a gate at the end of your garden.
Rooms.Name: Garden
Rooms.DetailedDescription: You see a vibrant and lively outdoor space. It's adorned with an array of colorful flowers, blooming bushes, and lush greenery. The gentle rustle of leaves and the occasional chirping of birds fill the air. A well-tended path winds through the garden, inviting you to explore its beauty. There's a big rusty gate that is covered in vines and greenery.

Interactives.DoorHint: Find the key and go through the door.

Rooms.Description: You have ventured beyond the gate into a dense forest.
Rooms.Name: Forest
Rooms.DetailedDescription: The towering trees create a natural canopy, casting dappled sunlight on the forest floor. A soft carpet of fallen leaves crunches beneath your feet as you explore. The air is filled with the soothing sounds of rustling leaves, distant bird calls, and the occasional scampering of unseen creatures. A narrow trail leads deeper into the heart of the woods.

Rooms.Description: You have ventured further into the dense forest.
Rooms.Name: Forest
Rooms.DetailedDescription: The trees here stand even taller, their branches intertwining to create an enchanting, shadowy grove. Sunlight struggles to pierce through the thick foliage, casting mystical patterns on the forest floor. The air feels cooler, and a mysterious hush pervades the surroundings. The trail ahead narrows, winding through ancient trees that seem to whisper tales of the untamed wilderness.

Monster.Name: Stefan
Monster.Description: There is a monster named Stefan here.
Monster.Hint: Find the correct item to defeat monster

Rooms.Description: You find yourself at the entrance of a mystical cave.
Rooms.Name: Mystical Cave Entrance
Rooms.DetailedDescription: The cave entrance is adorned with glowing crystals, illuminating the surroundings with an ethereal light. Strange symbols are etched into the cave walls, hinting at ancient mysteries. The air inside is cool and tinged with a hint of magic.

Rooms.Description: You have entered the mystical cave.
Rooms.Name: Mystical Cave
Rooms.DetailedDescription: The cave's interior is a mesmerizing display of shimmering crystals and otherworldly formations. A faint hum of mystical energy fills the air, creating an otherworldly atmosphere. The path ahead splits into multiple tunnels
